Course.Description: This course provides a foundation for good problem-solving skills focused on web applications programming.
Students are introduced to object-oriented programming, and given the tools to integrate PHP with other technologies, such as AJAX and XML.
This course targets introducing new technologies and trends in the web development area.
This course builds on the introduction to jQuery students received in Term 2, and is for web developers, or desktop application developers.
Industry standard project management is used daily in all varieties of web work and a necessary tool.
This course surveys the development of typographical design from its origins to current trends in digital typography.
This is a project based course that focuses on students implementing web design concepts and graphic skills.
This course introduces the students to user experience design, usability design, and interaction design.
The Introduction to Wordpress course uses hands-on practice, demonstrations, in-class assignments, projects, and critiques.
